Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 11th overall pick, by Cincinnati in 1972...
Injured on 7/27/1972 with a Pulled Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 9/3/1973 with a Broken Finger, out for 5 weeks...
Drove in 6 runs against Los Angeles on 9/25/1975...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles on 2/6/1980 to a 4-year deal worth $5,900,000 per year...
Was selected to the 1980 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/8/1980, hitting .440 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
